Html:
Does any one use Entity Framework with CompositeWPF? Have you instanticated the Entity Framework with the container (unity)? If yes, how have you done it.

I was thinking that it would make sense to have only one instance of the model availalble so performance is increased and "binding-updates" work nicely.

Thankx, Harry
For those in the CompositeWPF community looking to do this, the topic is covered in the Unity forum on the following link: http://www.codeplex.com/unity/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=36818
